extendedInfo.description: Now Including 2013 Events!NYC Free Summer Events guides you to free arts, sports, social, and educational events for the entire summer.  There is at least one event for every day from early June to late August.. usually many!  Take advantage of all that New York City has to offer!Explanation of Permissions Required:1. Write to Calendar: You can add an event directly to your calendar from the app. None of the events added invite others, so we do not utilize the 'email guest' functionality.2. Access Network State & Internet: Required for in-app ads. If there's a desire, we may release an ad-free version in the future.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I always thought I was a savvy New Yorker that knew where all the cool free stuff was... I was wrong but you\'ve made me cool again :)   Thanks  Mike
reviews.author: Michael Odom

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Great app.  Definitely worth the download.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: NYC Free Summer Events
reviews.comment: Great APP!  Thorough! Easy to use!  Thanx, Crys.  Dennis White
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App Awesome info
reviews.comment: I live in the city never know what\'s going on great way to plan days off
reviews.author: Luis Guzman

reviews.title: Year after year...
reviews.comment: I must have gotten the .doc version of this at least eight years ago...and every year at least two friends ask me \"where\'s the summer list?\" I will collect more cool points when I let them know about this app. Thanks for the consistency Crystal!
reviews.author: A Google User
